testcase.classname: Select one product and add it to cart then increase quantity.
testcase.name: Add Product to Cart and verify total amount.

failure.message: Could not invoke step [Select the specific mobile, print name , size , colour and Top {int} question and answer] defined at 'StepDefinition.AddItemAndVerifyAmount.select_the_specific_mobile_print_name_size_colour_and_top_question_and_answer(io.cucumber.datatable.DataTable)'. It appears there was a problem with the step definition. The converted arguments types were (java.lang.Integer)
